block.oc2r.computer.desc: Runs software from Flash Memory and Hard Disks.
block.oc2r.monitor.desc: A special framebuffer based monitor for your computer.
block.oc2r.network_connector.desc: Transmits network packets via Network Cables.
block.oc2r.network_hub.desc: Distributes network packets among all attached Network Connectors.
block.oc2r.flash_memory_flasher.desc: Used to flash a new firmware onto a flash memory chip.
block.oc2r.charger.desc: Charges entities and items in containers on top of it.
block.oc2r.creative_energy.desc: Provides unlimited energy to adjacent blocks. Intended for testing.
block.oc2r.projector.desc: Projects images onto surfaces in front of it.
block.oc2r.keyboard.desc: Allows keyboard input when using a projector.
item.oc2r.wrench.desc: Configures devices and dismantles them (while sneaking).
item.oc2r.manual.desc: Holds information on all things needed when working with Computers.
item.oc2r.memory.desc: Random Access Memory (RAM) used in Computers and Robots.
item.oc2r.hard_drive.desc: Mass storage for operating systems and data.
item.oc2r.floppy.desc: Portable storage used to transfer data between Computers.
item.oc2r.floppy_modern.desc: Newer version of portable storage used to transfer data between Computers.
item.oc2r.redstone_interface_card.desc: Emits and reads redstone signals through the Computer.
item.oc2r.network_interface_card.desc: Sends and receives network packets via attached Network Connectors.
item.oc2r.network_tunnel_card.desc: Sends and receives network packets to a linked device.
item.oc2r.file_import_export_card.desc: Imports and exports files from and into your real file system.
item.oc2r.web_import_export_card.desc: Imports and exports files from the web.
item.oc2r.robot.desc: A mobile Computer. Use a Scrench to pick it back up.
item.oc2r.inventory_operations_module.de: Moves items in, into and out of the Robot's inventory.
item.oc2r.sound_card.desc: Plays various sounds from its highly realistic sound bank.
item.oc2r.network_tunnel_module.desc: Sends and receives network packets to a linked device.
item.oc2r.silicon_blend.desc: A mixture of sand and quartz from which silicon is cooked.
item.oc2r.silicon_wafer.desc: A wafer ready for processor construction.
item.oc2r.raw_silicon_wafer.desc: A wafer with small imperfections that must be cooked out.
gui.oc2r.computer.capture_input.desc: When enabled, as long as the mouse cursor is hovering the terminal contents, all input will be captured, including the escape key.
gui.oc2r.computer.power.desc: Toggles the power state of the computer.
gui.oc2r.network_interface_card.info: Drag to rotate. Click faces to toggle connectivity.
message.oc2r.connector.error.too_far: Distance between connectors is too large.
message.oc2r.connector.error.obstructed: No clear line of sight between connectors.
message.oc2r.invalid_facade_block: This block cannot be used as a facade.
tooltip.oc2r.flash_memory_missing: A flash memory containing a firmware is required to boot.
tooltip.oc2r.memory_missing: Some memory is required to load the flash memory for execution to boot.
tooltip.oc2r.hard_drive_missing: Most systems will require a root file system to boot.
tooltip.oc2r.cpu_missing: A cpu is required to boot
